metadata.title: CVE-2020-14295 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A SQL injection issue in color.php in Cacti 1.2.12 allows an admin to inject SQL via the filter parameter. This can lead to remote command execution because the product accepts stacked queries.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-14295` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
